review: The Roku I bought has a terrible time connecting to my wireless network. There is little information telling you to carefully select the wireless channel on your existing wireless network. This thing only really works well on channel 11 for me. I have a lot of neighbors as I live in a neighborhood of townhouses with many networks. The channels that this device operates at is a busy one in my neighborhood. I constantly have issues with other devices using this channel in my house, which includes multiple phones, tablets, computers and gaming devices. I pretty much gave up on this and gave it away to a friend who didn't have anything better. I would suggest if you are planning on purchasing one of these devices, that you use a wireless channel analyzer to see if your neighbors networks will be interfering with your connection upon setting up your network to work with this device. The main reason I purchased this was for the Spotify app which my PS4 didn't have when I bought this, which it now has. My playstation has no issues at all with different channels.
